eu.ueb.acem.web.utils

Class PickListConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ueb.acem.web.utils.PickListConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.faces.convert.Converter

    public class PickListConverter
extends Object
implements javax.faces.convert.Converter
    A converter implementation for PrimeFaces PickList component. It must be referenced using the converter attribute of the p:pickList element with a value equal to "PickListConverter" (in other words, use <p:pickList converter="PickListConverter" .../>). The view beans must implement the Pickable interface for this converter to work.
    Since:
    2014-02-25
    Author:
    Gr√©goire Colbert
    See Also:
    PrimeFaces PickList component
